thread.title: Lynsey

author: Lynsey
title: Lynsey
text: I recently ordered a couple of items from Topvintage after the size I needed was unavailable from my favourite online UK website. I was a bit nervous about ordering outwith UK but this proved to be unfounded. My items arrived within 3 dsys (quicker than many UK companies deliver!),beautifully packaged with the lovely surprise of a postcard,bar of chocolate and discount code! Topvintage is now going to be my go to online shop!
